text:
Bokksu is an American subscription service that sends subscribers local Japanese snacks and candies. It was founded by Danny Taing.
History.
Bokksu was founded by Danny Taing in November 2015. In first two years, company managed to sell 500,000 units to over 75 countries.
Items are packed in Osaka and then shipped worldwide. It offers two types of services - classic and tasting, with difference in number of items and price.
In January 2020, Decathlon Capital Partners invested unknown amount in Bokksu.
